00021 bool moreCmp( const util::istring &a, const util::istring &b ) {return a.length() > b.length();}
00022 }

00024 void FileFormat::write( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & )
00025 {
00026     std::list<std::string> names = makeUniqueFilenames( images, filename );
00027     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator inames = names.begin();
00028     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00029         std::string uniquePath = *( inames++ );
00030         LOG( Runtime, notice )   << "Writing image of size " << ref.getSizeAsVector() << " to " <<  uniquePath;
00031 
00032         try {
00033             write( ref, uniquePath, dialect );
00034         } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00035             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00036                     << "Failed to write image to " <<  uniquePath << " using " <<  getName() << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00037         }
00038     }
00039 }

00041 bool FileFormat::hasOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &name, const isis::util::PropertyMap &object, isis::LogLevel level )
00042 {
00043     if ( object.hasProperty( name ) ) {
00044         return true;
00045     } else {
00046         LOG( Runtime, level ) << "Missing property " << util::MSubject( name );
00047         return false;
00048     }
00049 }

00061 std::list< util::istring > FileFormat::getSuffixes()const
00062 {
00063     std::list<util::istring> ret = util::stringToList<util::istring>( suffixes(), boost::regex( "[[:space:]]" ) );
00064     BOOST_FOREACH( util::istring & ref, ret ) {
00065         ref.erase( 0, ref.find_first_not_of( '.' ) ); // remove leading . if there are some
00066     }
00067     ret.sort( _internal::moreCmp ); //start with the longest suffix
00068     return ret;
00069 }
00070 
00071 std::pair< std::string, std::string > FileFormat::makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const
00072 {
00073     std::list<util::istring> supported_suffixes = getSuffixes();
00074     util::istring ifilename( filename.begin(), filename.end() );
00075     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::istring & suffix, supported_suffixes ) {
00076         size_t at = ifilename.rfind( suffix );
00077 
00078         if( at != ifilename.npos ) {
00079             if( at && ifilename[at - 1] == '.' )
00080                 at--;
00081 
00082             return std::make_pair( filename.substr( 0, at ), filename.substr( at ) );
00083         }
00084     }
00085     return std::make_pair( filename, std::string() );
00086 }
00087 
00088 std::string FileFormat::makeFilename( const util::PropertyMap &props, std::string namePattern )
00089 {
00090     boost::regex reg( "\\{[^{}]+\\}" );
00091     boost::match_results<std::string::iterator> what;
00092 
00093     while( boost::regex_search( namePattern.begin(), namePattern.end() , what, reg ) ) {
00094         const util::PropertyMap::KeyType prop( what[0].str().substr( 1, what.length() - 2 ).c_str() );
00095 
00096         if( props.hasProperty( prop ) ) {
00097 
00098             const std::string pstring =  boost::regex_replace( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]/\\\\]" ), "_" );
00099 
00100             namePattern.replace( what[0].first, what[0].second, pstring );
00101             LOG( Debug, info )
00102                     << "Replacing " << util::MSubject( util::PropertyMap::KeyType( "{" ) + prop + "}" ) << " by "   << util::MSubject( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ) )
00103                     << " the string is now " << util::MSubject( namePattern );
00104         } else {
00105             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "The property " << util::MSubject( prop ) << " does not exist - ignoring it";
00106             namePattern.replace( what[0].first, what[0].second, "" ); // it must be removed, or it will match forever
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     return namePattern;
00111 }
00112 std::list<std::string> FileFormat::makeUniqueFilenames( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &namePattern )const
00113 {
00114     std::list<std::string> ret;
00115     std::map<std::string, unsigned short> names, used_names;
00116     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00117         names[makeFilename( ref, namePattern )]++;
00118     }
00119 
00120     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00121         std::string name = makeFilename( ref, namePattern );
00122 
00123         if( names[name] > 1 ) {
00124             const unsigned short number = ++used_names[name];
00125             const unsigned short length = ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )names[name] ) - ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )number );
00126             const std::string snumber = std::string( length, '0' ) + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( number );
00127             const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( name );
00128             name = splitted.first + "_" + snumber + splitted.second;
00129         }
00130 
00131         ret.push_back( name );
00132     }
00133     return ret;
00134 }
